metadata.title: USN-4224-1 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: Simon Charette discovered that the password reset functionality in Django used a Unicode case insensitive query to retrieve accounts associated with an email address. An attacker could possibly use this to obtain password reset tokens and hijack accounts.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4224-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3-django - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.11 python-django-doc - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.11 python-django-common - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.11 python-django - 1.8.7-1ubuntu5.11 No subscription required
